attributes.action: Illegals NOT ALLOWED TO VOTE. "Only Americans"
attributes.additional_details: The California Governor promised Illegals if they vote for him, He would come up with a GRANT to send their American born children to College. This is BUYING votes!. A form of lobbying for political selffish gain. He won the office. many thired & more generations of American children do not have the same wrights as illegals. I am a disabled korean vet, we were told, if we were dishonorably discharged we would lose the wright to vote. None of these people were in my fox hole HELPING me and the American people for our wrights to live with the freedom. Lets stop this BRIBERY now!!.
